headers.subject: [PATCH] net: dm9000: Fix build
headers.received: (majordomo@vger.kernel.org) by vger.kernel.org via listexpand id S1751340Ab1DRLEg (ORCPT <rfc822;lesa.figueroa.barnes@a.markmail.org>); Mon, 18 Apr 2011 07:04:36 -0400

from opensource.wolfsonmicro.com ([80.75.67.52]:36520 "EHLO opensource2.wolfsonmicro.com" rhost-flags-OK-OK-OK-FAIL) by vger.kernel.org with ESMTP id S1752422Ab1DRLEf (ORCPT <rfc822;netdev@vger.kernel.org>); Mon, 18 Apr 2011 07:04:35 -0400

body.para: Commit c88fcb (net: dm9000: convert to hw_features) broke the build of the dm9000 driver since it merged functions which use different names for the board info structure used for I/O operations without updating all the references to use the same name. Fix that.

diff --git a/drivers/net/dm9000.c b/drivers/net/dm9000.c index f7bdebb..fbaff35 100644 --- a/drivers/net/dm9000.c +++ b/drivers/net/dm9000.c @@ -768,7 +768,7 @@ dm9000_init_dm9000(struct net_device *dev)
iow(db, DM9000_GPCR, GPCR_GEP_CNTL); /* Let GPIO0 output */
body.footer: -- To unsubscribe from this list: send the line "unsubscribe netdev" in the body of a message to majordomo@vger.kernel.org More majordomo info at http://vger.kernel.org/majordomo-info.html
